long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your web browsing experience with our text-to-speech (TTS) extension.  Easily convert selected text on any webpage into natural-sounding speech.  Whether you're looking to improve accessibility or give your eyes a break from reading, this extension helps you listen to your favorite articles, emails, and more.  Customize the voice, speed, and language to match your preferences, all while ensuring complete privacy—no data is collected or shared.

Key Features:

1. Convert selected text on any webpage into speech
2. Quickly activate text-to-speech via right-click menu
3. Customize voice settings, playback speed, and language
4. Works seamlessly on all websites
5. Privacy-first: No data collection or tracking
